doc:
Geoffrey Arend https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geoffrey_Arend 0 Geoffrey Arend (born February 28, 1978) is an American film, television, voice and theater actor. He is best known for his role as Ethan Gross on the ABC drama series Body of Proof and currently plays Matt Mahoney on the CBS political drama series Madam Secretary. Geoffrey_Arend ( born February_28_,_1978 ) is an_American_film_,_television_,_voice_and_theater_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Ethan_Gross on the_ABC_drama_series_Body of Proof and currently plays Matt_Mahoney on the_CBS_political_drama_series_Madam_Secretary .
